## tranzia send



```
tranzia send [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --address string   address to send tcp request (default "127.0.0.1")
  -h, --help             help for send
  -m, --message string   message body to send to the server
  -p, --port string      port value (default "9000")
```
